title: Our Teens Need Help Problem-Solving
description:
A class of home-schooled teenagers calls Dr. Laura to discuss the best way to solve problems among their peer group. - Dr. Laura: "Make decisions based on how proud your future self would be of the way you've handled the situation."

What could your teen use Dr. Laura's help with? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
